name: Proof_316 — Egg Weight Measurement (2025-12-11, 07:11)
description:
At 07:11 on 2025-12-11, the egg collected from the morning output was weighed at 53.2 grams.  
This measurement provides verifiable evidence of daily production quality and physical characteristics under the DGCP™ continuous proof system.
